option.name: originalContent
option.value:
services: apex-stealer: build: . container_name: apex-stealer restart: unless-stopped volumes: - ./config.json:/app/config.json - setups:/app/setups networks: - apex-network labels: - "traefik.enable=true" - "traefik.http.routers.apex-web.rule=Host(`setups.michelgerding.nl`) && (PathPrefix(`/admin`) || Path(`/`))" - "traefik.http.routers.apex-web.entrypoints=websecure" - "traefik.http.routers.apex-web.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt" - "traefik.http.services.apex-web.loadbalancer.server.port=3000"
webdav: image: dgraziotin/nginx-webdav-nononsense container_name: apex-webdav restart: unless-stopped environment: - WEBDAV_USERNAME=apex - WEBDAV_PASSWORD=${WEBDAV_PASSWORD:-changeme} - SERVER_NAMES=setups.michelgerding.nl - TIMEOUTS_S=1200 - PUID=1000 - PGID=1000 volumes: - setups:/data:ro networks: - apex-network labels: - "traefik.enable=true" - "traefik.http.routers.apex-webdav.rule=Host(`setups.michelgerding.nl`) && PathPrefix(`/dav`)" - "traefik.http.routers.apex-webdav.entrypoints=websecure" - "traefik.http.routers.apex-webdav.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt" - "traefik.http.middlewares.strip-dav.stripprefix.prefixes=/dav" - "traefik.http.routers.apex-webdav.middlewares=strip-dav" - "traefik.http.services.apex-webdav.loadbalancer.server.port=80"
traefik: image: traefik:v3.2 container_name: apex-traefik restart: unless-stopped command: - "--api.insecure=false" - "--providers.docker=true" - "--providers.docker.exposedbydefault=false" - "--entrypoints.web.address=:80" - "--entrypoints.websecure.address=:443" - "--entrypoints.web.http.redirections.entrypoint.to=websecure" - "--entrypoints.web.http.redirections.entrypoint.scheme=https" - "--certificatesresolvers.letsencrypt.acme.httpchallenge=true" - "--certificatesresolvers.letsencrypt.acme.httpchallenge.entrypoint=web" - "--certificatesresolvers.letsencrypt.acme.email=${ACME_EMAIL:-admin@michelgerding.nl}" - "--certificatesresolvers.letsencrypt.acme.storage=/letsencrypt/acme.json" ports: - "80:80" - "443:443" volumes: - /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock:ro - letsencrypt:/letsencrypt networks: - apex-network
volumes: setups: letsencrypt:
networks: apex-network: driver: bridge

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
services: apex-stealer: image: ghcr.io/michelgerding/apex-stealer:latest build: . container_name: apex-stealer restart: unless-stopped volumes: - ./config.json:/app/config.json - setups:/app/setups networks: - apex-network labels: - "traefik.enable=true" - "traefik.http.routers.apex-web.rule=Host(`setups.michelgerding.nl`) && (PathPrefix(`/admin`) || Path(`/`))" - "traefik.http.routers.apex-web.entrypoints=websecure" - "traefik.http.routers.apex-web.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt" - "traefik.http.services.apex-web.loadbalancer.server.port=3000"
webdav: image: dgraziotin/nginx-webdav-nononsense container_name: apex-webdav restart: unless-stopped environment: - WEBDAV_USERNAME=apex - WEBDAV_PASSWORD=${WEBDAV_PASSWORD:-changeme} - SERVER_NAMES=setups.michelgerding.nl - TIMEOUTS_S=1200 - PUID=1000 - PGID=1000 volumes: - setups:/data:ro networks: - apex-network labels: - "traefik.enable=true" - "traefik.http.routers.apex-webdav.rule=Host(`setups.michelgerding.nl`) && PathPrefix(`/dav`)" - "traefik.http.routers.apex-webdav.entrypoints=websecure" - "traefik.http.routers.apex-webdav.tls.certresolver=letsencrypt" - "traefik.http.middlewares.strip-dav.stripprefix.prefixes=/dav" - "traefik.http.routers.apex-webdav.middlewares=strip-dav" - "traefik.http.services.apex-webdav.loadbalancer.server.port=80"
traefik: image: traefik:v3.2 container_name: apex-traefik restart: unless-stopped command: - "--api.insecure=false" - "--providers.docker=true" - "--providers.docker.exposedbydefault=false" - "--entrypoints.web.address=:80" - "--entrypoints.websecure.address=:443" - "--entrypoints.web.http.redirections.entrypoint.to=websecure" - "--entrypoints.web.http.redirections.entrypoint.scheme=https" - "--certificatesresolvers.letsencrypt.acme.httpchallenge=true" - "--certificatesresolvers.letsencrypt.acme.httpchallenge.entrypoint=web" - "--certificatesresolvers.letsencrypt.acme.email=${ACME_EMAIL:-admin@michelgerding.nl}" - "--certificatesresolvers.letsencrypt.acme.storage=/letsencrypt/acme.json" ports: - "80:80" - "443:443" volumes: - /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock:ro - letsencrypt:/letsencrypt networks: - apex-network
volumes: setups: letsencrypt:
networks: apex-network: driver: bridge

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
services: apex-stealer: build: . container_name: apex-stealer restart: unless-stopped volumes: - ./config.json:/app/config.json - setups:/app/setups ports: - "3000:3000" networks: - apex-network
webdav: image: dgraziotin/nginx-webdav-nononsense container_name: apex-webdav restart: unless-stopped environment: - WEBDAV_USERNAME=apex - WEBDAV_PASSWORD=apex - SERVER_NAMES=localhost - TIMEOUTS_S=1200 - PUID=1000 - PGID=1000 volumes: - setups:/data:ro ports: - "80:80" networks: - apex-network
volumes: setups:
networks: apex-network: driver: bridge

option.value:

webdav: image: dgraziotin/nginx-webdav-nononsense container_name: apex-webdav restart: unless-stopped environment: - WEBDAV_USERNAME=apex - WEBDAV_PASSWORD=apex - SERVER_NAMES=localhost - TIMEOUTS_S=1200 - PUID=1000 - PGID=1000 volumes: - setups:/data:ro ports: - "80:80" networks: - apex-network
volumes: setups:
networks: apex-network: driver: bridge
